name: MeatThermometer
0:
”Alexa, start Meat Thermometer”
”Alexa, launch Meat Thermometer”
”Alexa, begin Meat Thermometer”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: meat thermometer
des: This skill will guide you as you cook the meat of your choice. The best way to enjoy your meat is to cook it as much as you need to for health requirements but not too much so as to dry out the final product. This skill is best used in conjunction with a meat thermometer.
